product_name: Mountain Hardwear Nut Shell High Gaiters
long_description: Keep snow and rocks out of your boots with these all-season Mountain Hardwear Nut Shell gaiters. Shells are constructed from packcloth nylon for durability and a polyurethane coating for wind and water resistance. Low-profile VELCRO(R) brand front flap closes securely; top cuff cinches tight with drawcord adjustment. Replaceable and adjustable flat-lace boot straps ensure a secure fit underfoot.
short_description: Keep snow and rocks out of your boots with these all-season Mountain Hardwear Nut Shell gaiters.
